analytic.title: ‘You Made Him a Little Lower Than the Angels; You Crowned Him with Glory and Honour’: Ps 8:5 in the Interpretation of the Antiochian School. An Alternative to Classic Imago Dei Anthropology?

monogr.title: Imago Dei: Forscher aus dem Osten und Westen Europas an den Quellen des gemeinsamen Glaubens Studientagung. L’viv, 12.–14. September 2019 “Imago Dei”

body.bibl: Buda, Daniel. “‘You Made Him a Little Lower Than the Angels; You Crowned Him with Glory and Honour’: Ps 8:5 in the Interpretation of the Antiochian School. An Alternative to Classic Imago Dei Anthropology?” In Imago Dei: Forscher Aus Dem Osten Und Westen Europas an Den Quellen Des Gemeinsamen Glaubens Studientagung. L’viv, 12.–14. September 2019 “Imago Dei,” edited by Theresia Hainthaler, Franz Mali, Gregor Emmenegger, and Alexey Morozov, 323–36. Pro Oriente 43, Wiener Patristische Tagungen 9. Innsbruck: Tyrolia Verlag, 2021.

Daniel Buda, ‘You Made Him a Little Lower Than the Angels; You Crowned Him with Glory and Honour’: Ps 8:5 in the Interpretation of the Antiochian School. An Alternative to Classic Imago Dei Anthropology?,” in Imago Dei: Forscher Aus Dem Osten Und Westen Europas an Den Quellen Des Gemeinsamen Glaubens Studientagung. L’viv, 12.–14.
